Player History

Traded from Pittsburgh to Cleveland on 3/2/2014 (Going to PIT: 2B R. Weeks, 3B A. Littlejohn, P J. Lester, P R. Perry. Going to CLE: 3B J. Arias, 3B R. Shaffer, P D. Bundy, P B. Halsey)...
Traded from Cleveland to Chicago (N) on 2/12/2016 (Going to CHN: RF R. Shaffer, P A. Cruz. Going to CLE: P J. Papelbon)...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/14/2016, off Scott Diamond (PIT)...
